data.name: Chef Chen
data.detailed_description:
《Chef Chen》 is a cooperative multiplayer game, where you can cook the monsters in the fantasy world with many adventures and enjoy the food together. Currently the game supports up to 4 players (Local) and Steam Remote Play. Let’s work together and make delicious dishes!

Chef Chen came to the fantasy world by chance. He encounters a group of hungry animals, and sees monster bodies everywhere. With Chef Chen's excellent cooking skill, he turns the monsters into delicious dishes! That saves his animal friends who were almost starved to death and it replenishes their strength and magic power so that they can continue the journey of adventure.

Would you like to sit down with your friends and have a nice meal? Play the role of Chef Chen and use your talent and team up with your friends to defeat the monsters. Let's cook a good meal together, and then enjoy the gourmet.

* Food to hunt

* Food to hunt

* Limited kitchen knife availability

data.supported_languages: Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian
data.reviews:
“The Taiwanese version of the overcooked debut of the domestic game "Chef Chen" allows Taiwanese games to keep up with the international pace.”
ETToday News

“"Chinese Cooking" Taiwanese multiplayer cooperative party computer game "Chef Chen" is a brilliant and creative...”
MENCLUB

“Taiwan's independent team's new work "Chef Chen" is about to start the first experience and work together to make monsters delicious dishes”
Bahamut Gaming Information

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 5830
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD A8-7500
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti / Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS High Sierra - 10.13.1
  • Processor: 3.1 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780m / AMD Radeon Pro 560
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
